heading: HB05712
0: AN ACT PROHIBITING ALL RETIRED AND ACTIVE MILITARY AND POLICE PERSONNEL, INCLUDING OFFICERS, FROM BEING APPOINTED IN A CONCURRENT OR ANY OTHER CAPACITY TO THE POSITIONS OF SECRETARY, UNDERSECRETARY, HEAD OR MEMBER OF GOVERNING BODIES OF GOVERNMENT-OWNED OR CONTROLLED CORPORATIONS AND AGENCIES AND OTHER EQUIVALENT POSITIONS
principal-authors: DE JESUS, EMMI A.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION since 2017-05-29
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05712
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING ALL RETIRED AND ACTIVE MILITARY AND POLICE PERSONNEL, INCLUDING OFFICERS, FROM BEING APPOINTED IN A CONCURRENT OR ANY OTHER CAPACITY TO THE POSITIONS OF SECRETARY, UNDERSECRETARY, HEAD OR MEMBER OF GOVERNING BODIES OF GOVERNMENT-OWNED OR CONTROLLED CORPORATIONS AND AGENCIES AND OTHER EQUIVALENT POSITIONS
